description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76012-INVASIVE CARCINOMA OF THE BREAST: Complete Excision (Less Than Total Mastectomy, Including Specimens Designated Biopsy, Lumpectomy, Quadrantectomy, and Partial Mastectomy With or Without Axillary Contents) and Mastectomy (Total, Modified Radical, Radical With or Without Axillary Contents).

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: ESTRGN_RECP_IMM_QNT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor Immunoreactive Tumor Cells Quantitation.

columns.name: ESTRGN_RECP_PC_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor - Specify Results Percentage.

columns.name: ESTRGN_RCP_AVG_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor - Specify Results Average.

columns.name: ESTRGN_RECP_INTRP_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor Results (interpretation).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Positive (>= 1% immunoreactive tumor cells present)


Negative (absence of immunoreactivity or < 1% immunoreactive tumor cells present)


Uninterpretable

columns.name: ESTRGN_INTRP_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor - Specify Interpretation.

columns.name: ESTRGN_EXT_CN_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor External Controls (immunoreactivity in normal cells, carcinomas, or cell lines).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Control cells are appropriately immunoreactive


Control cells are not immunoreactive


Other

columns.name: ESTRGN_EXT_CN_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Estrogen Receptor External Controls.

columns.name: ESTRGN_RECP_IN_CN_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor Internal Controls (immunoreactivity in normal cells).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Normal cells are appropriately immunoreactive


Normal cells are not immunoreactive


Normal cells are not present


Other

columns.name: ESTRGN_IN_CN_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Estrogen Receptor Internal Controls.

columns.name: ESTRGN_ASSAY_CND_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Estrogen Receptor - Standard Assay Conditions.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Achieved for this assay


Not achieved for this assay


Other

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Estrogen Receptor - Standard Assay Conditions.

columns.name: PROGESTERONE_RECP_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Progesterone Receptor.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Performed


Immunoreactive tumor cells present


No immunoreactive tumor cells present


Pending


Not performed


Other

columns.name: PRGSTN_RECP_PERF_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Progesterone Receptor Performed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries:

Performed on another specimen

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Progesterone Receptor - Specify Performed Specimen.

columns.name: PRGSTN_RECP_PERCN_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Progesterone Receptor Results (percentage of cells).

 Category Entries:

No immunoreactive tumor cells present


Results unknown


Other
